description: This file provides functions to extract and format version information from an input dictionary, supporting both list and string representations of version data.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts a three-part version number from the input info dictionary, handling 'version' as either a list or a string, and defaults to [1, 0, 0] if not specified.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by utilizing the GetVersion function.
